intro: An unusual trainer with all kinds of Bug paraphernalia blocks your way!
introDialogue:
Hey, trainer! I’m on a mission to find the rarest Bug Pokémon in existence!$You must love Bug Pokémon too, right?
Everyone loves Bug Pokémon!
title: The Bug-Type Superfan
speaker: Bug-Type Superfan
description:
The trainer prattles on, not even waiting for a response…

It seems the only way to get out of this situation is by catching the trainer’s attention!

1.label: Offer to Battle
1.tooltip:
(-) Tough Battle
(+) Teach any Pokémon a Bug-type Move
1.selected:
A challenge, eh?
My bugs are more than ready for you!

2.label: Show Your Bug-types
2.disabledTooltip: You need at least 1 Bug-type Pokémon on your team to select this.
2.selected: You show the trainer all your Bug-type Pokémon…
2.selected0To1: Huh? You only have {{numBugTypes}}…$Guess I’m wasting my breath on someone like you…
2.selected2To3:
Hey, you’ve got {{numBugTypes}}!
Not bad.$Here, this might help you on your journey to catch more!
2.selected4To5:
What? You have {{numBugTypes}}?
Nice!$You’re not quite at my level, but I can see shades of myself in you!$Take this, my young apprentice!
2.selected6: Whoa! {{numBugTypes}}!$You must love Bug-types almost as much as I do!$Here, take this as a token of our camaraderie!

3.tooltip:

(+) Receive a Gift Item

Whoa! A {{selectedItem}}, for me?
You’re not so bad, kid!$As a token of my appreciation,
I want you to have this special gift!$It’s been passed all through my family, and now I want you to have it!
